reviews.text: We visited Barcelona this summer and were lucky to find this gallery just strolling through the narrow streets of Gothic quarter. It's quite small gallery, but with big choise of exclusive souvenirs and reproductions of original works. The price range is wide (some simple souvenirs are quite cheap, while original artworks would cost accordingly), staff is helpful, location is very good and easy to find (we came back the next day to buy a bit more magnets for our friends).

We stopped in as we were strolling through the area in the evening. They have exceptional reproductions of original art work as well as the originals for sale in the gallery. Gorgeous works by Alexandra Bryksa, an accomplished water color artist.

The best watercolor reproductions in Barcelona.
Beautiful original works by Alexandra Bryksa artist. 
I bought there some magnets that look like paintings. 
I recommend this shop
